website_summaries.verdict: Flavored or unflavored powder containing 100% micronized creatine monohydrate.
pros: This 60-serving container is enough powder for 2 months
Unflavored powder mixes well into any shake
Customers love the flavored varieties for powder-only mixes
5 grams of creatine monohydrate per serving
cons: Several customers reported that their container came without a scoop

customer_reviews.title: Get it now
customer_reviews.text: I hold a Bachelor of Science in Kinesiology from LSU, take my word for it, this is EXACTLY what you want. The powdered sugar texture allows this to blend perfectly in protein shakes. Plenty of servings to last long. You cannot physically eat enough to get your needed creatine intake every day, this takes out the guesswork. Don't get me wrong, you can't slack off in the kitchen and expect this to be your safety net. If your nutrition is on point, and you DRINK ENOUGH WATER throughout the day, you will observe optimal results. *NOTE: USELESS if you are doing cardio, OPTIMAL for RESISTANCE TRAINING.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Kiefer

customer_reviews.title: Cellmass is the only  BSN product still worth a dam stay away from all there other hyped up BS line of crap read my review !!
customer_reviews.text: Still Good stuff cant say that about the rest of the BSN line up ! I used to love all there products not anymore they have fallen off big time!! NO explode was one of my favorite ones as well as Axis HT and Nitrix Am PM they worked awesome together now the red pill Nitrix are a joke!! And they don't even sell Axis HT anymore and N.O Explode is garbage doesn't do shit for me anymore I used to brag about it but not anymore it's all in the past now unfortunately !! 🤨😐😣
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: It’s creatine, it just works
customer_reviews.text: No flavor (which is a plus) and works well. Definitely does what it is intended to do (noticed about 3-4lb weight increase over the first week as my muscles absorbed additional water. I follow a custom 5/3/1 lifting program and within two weeks I noticed I was able to get 3+ extra reps on my AMRAP sets which is exactly what I was looking for. It’s not a steroid and won’t give you muscles, but if you’re into weight lifting, it will help your muscles squeeze out a couple extra reps at your limits which helps with conditioning. I use this to mix in my protein shake along with some fiber.
customer_reviews.author: Randomlett3rs

customer_reviews.title: Nauseous, bloating
customer_reviews.text: Made me incredibly bloated and nauseous for about a week. Thought it was something I ate but I’m guessing it was the monohydrate form of creatine not dissolving in water. Switched to micronized and no problems
customer_reviews.author: Hubson M

customer_reviews.title: Nice quantity for the price and mixes well
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice quantity for the price. It mixes well in water and with other pre/post workout supplements. The only real complaint is that the micronized powder is susceptible to static electricity. Every time I open the container or take a scoop, some of the powder leaps out. Keep in mind, the total amount that I've lost doesn't even equal a tenth of a scoop, yet. So it is not that big of a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Turtle

customer_reviews.title: Package was open and leaked powder everywhere:(
customer_reviews.text: The product was open and had leaked powder everywhere. So far...lots of bloating. I have had better results with less expensive recovery and creatine supplements.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Anne Cajune

customer_reviews.title: Over 55 and making it happen
customer_reviews.text: I use creative as part of supplement intake along with pre-work out noexplode and then post I’m 56 years old and my gains in mass and strength is totally electric I have been asked am a personal trainer I just laugh mine is for self . If I could have a better job to keep purchasing I would but to keep I’m up you almost need a sponsor, thanks BSN
customer_reviews.author: kevin M.

customer_reviews.title: it is what it is
customer_reviews.text: while on CM I always feel stronger and have more vascularity on the 2nd week and this does it. I normally like to stick to reputable brands with supps and only recently used ON since micro versions came out. Flavorless, what a joke... can they make a slight hint of vanilla? That would pair nicely with nearly anything... I can still taste it in my chocolate whey (ON isolate)
customer_reviews.author: West Coast Gen X

customer_reviews.title: Stomach pain.
customer_reviews.text: I started taking creatine 5 years ago never had any problems but this stuff just destroyed my stomach, I got pain, I'm so tired, I'm dehydrated also I got a really bad diarrhea and I just taking 3gr a day. not using this product any more.
customer_reviews.author: Marvin

customer_reviews.title: It contains Acesulfame Potassium :/
customer_reviews.text: This product contains the artificial sweetener Acesulfame Potassium. Early studies showed a potential link between the sweetener and development of multiple cancers in laboratory animals. Long-term exposure to methylene chloride (a component of Acesulfame K) can cause nausea, headaches, mood problems, impairment of the liver and kidneys, problems with eyesight and possibly cancer. This product also contains Sucralose (splenda). Get rid of the artificial sweeteners!!
customer_reviews.author: Public name

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat the best
customer_reviews.text: I've always used cellmass and was never disappointed. I don't like Watermelon flavor in general but I bought this because it was significantly cheaper. The Blue Razz is the best flavor in my opinion. After a few months, the powder did get moldy from not finishing it. I assumed this would happen so beware if you don't plan to finish it weeks after opening.
customer_reviews.author: Hawaii

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY! HAS RED 40 IN IT.
customer_reviews.text: While arctic berry tastes great, why still include red 40? A chemical made from coal tar? Mmmm cancer. Come on BSN. The amino x i tried gets its coloring from red beets, why not use this instead?
customer_reviews.author: MarianSK

customer_reviews.title: Great product, not sure if it helped me with ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product, not sure if it helped me with strength, but greatly decreased soreness after an intense workout. No other creatine product did that for me. Great taste and smooth to go down with just cold water. Kind of like cool aid
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Get them GAINS..
customer_reviews.text: Ive used this product for a few months works very well, you do notice a bit of size and strength but you must be consistent and take this product everyday even on off days. would also recommend drinking lots of water.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Rios

customer_reviews.title: Best for mixing
customer_reviews.text: One thing I hate about supplements is when it doesn't mix smooth. Most "micronized" creatine retains the grit, regardless of your agitation method. This one is different. It's lighter than powdered sugar and completely mixes with the protein shakes I make. I'm on my second tub and will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: 0 blends easily into water and the taste is good enough for ...
customer_reviews.text: Have been taking on and off for years. The 2.0 blends easily into water and the taste is good enough for a shot. Started noticing fairly rapid muscle gain and recovery within the first week or so after returning to the gym. I do not take on non-workout days as some others do - I give my kidneys a break from time to time just in case. Never any stomach issues with this and helps relieve any soreness you may have from the day before and prepare you for your next workout.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for the buck.
customer_reviews.text: Love this creatine. It does what it’s supposed to do. You can workout for much longer and it increases strength like crazy. Gain weight like crazy and look good. Make sure you drink plenty of water while taking it and you won’t have any problems. Stay consistent with it and you don’t need to load with this creatine.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Clinger

customer_reviews.title: Good in a pinch, straight quality Creatine Monohydrate
customer_reviews.text: The only downside is it can be purchased cheaper from bulk supplement dealers (ie no-frills, no brands, etc). But in a pinch it's a good value for what you get, but not the best. And the product is solid. Flavorless, as creatine should be.
customer_reviews.author: J. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Probably the best one.
customer_reviews.text: Dissolves very easily in even a plastic cup filled with ice cold water. Never had stomach cramps like with another brand's product. I use 2 scoop / serving twice a day during loading for a week. For maintenance I use one scoop a serving, once a day, preferably in the morning or in my post workout shake. The product is only useful if you consume decent amount of water during the day.
customer_reviews.author: Peter P.

customer_reviews.title: Best Monohydrate Product - Fine powder, tasteless, mixes well, Weightlifter approved
customer_reviews.text: Likes - Price is great, Works better than any other creatine product I've tried, tasteless, oderless, mixes perfectly (doesnt turn to sand at the bottom of a cup like other ones out there), I recommend mixing it with Optimum Nutrition Amino Energy BCAA. Results are undenyable. A rarely review products but this one gets the 5 Star status from a 13 year natural weightlifter.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew O'Connell

customer_reviews.title: Great creatine
customer_reviews.text: This is flavorless product, i dont like to take it by itself so i add it to my protein shake everyday. I saw great results After using it. If you’re thinking about using Creatine this is one of the best products in the market.
customer_reviews.author: Bilal Alhawasli

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. No flavor to it and its actually what I needed. Mine did come with a scoop but I wish they made it black or any other color than clear plastic to make it easier to find.
customer_reviews.author: TERRENCE

customer_reviews.title: Not What product claims
customer_reviews.text: Reason it has the texture of flour? That’s what it is. I gave this product a try. Nothing happens. Those who claim they have degrees trying to promote this flour are making money selling it. Not Recommended
customer_reviews.author: jixxer

customer_reviews.title: It dissolves completely!
customer_reviews.text: I loved that it completely dissolved in my water! I’ve tried others and they leave a “dirt like” texture because they don’t dissolve completely, but this one was awesome!!!
customer_reviews.author: Karla

customer_reviews.title: Tasty
customer_reviews.text: I bought a few post-workout recovery and they always get moisture in them. And when that happens, the powder clumps up and hardens. I realize that I should leave the humidity and moisture control device (bag of silica) in the bottle. It's a good product and it is very tasty. I use this after working 11 hours in a distribution center order picking.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Vang

customer_reviews.title: Super fine, mixes well
customer_reviews.text: There are cheaper sources of creatine, which should be as effective. But this stuff is so fine, it actually mixes into liquid. I had no idea creatine could be this painless to add to stuff! I used to use ON brand but that was gritty and didn’t mix into anything, like adding sand to my drink or oatmeal or whatever. Night and day difference. BSN is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Michael T Kozono

customer_reviews.title: Massive pumps
customer_reviews.text: Using for about a month. The gains and results are nice I like to mix it with my preworkout. The only part that I dont like is it doesnt mix well and have to constantly shake so I dont end up chewing on it. But for the price and the quality is well within reason to continue use.
customer_reviews.author: stevey

customer_reviews.title: Not as many servings as description states
customer_reviews.text: I don’t have a problem with the product itself, however with the item description provided by Amazon. In the description it states that it is 50 servings, but it came in packaging that only contains 25 servings.
customer_reviews.author: Donald S.

customer_reviews.title: It’s great!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for mixing in with my protein. I’ve had it by itself and it’s not awful. But if you can add it to something post workout- even better.
customer_reviews.author: EAR

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Cheap stuff i been using it for 2 months i haven't noticed any progress.
customer_reviews.author: Aziz

customer_reviews.title: Does the job, but the packaging + product is a MESS!
customer_reviews.text: It's creatine. It has no taste, it does the job, one scoop is one serving. The problem is the packaging. As soon as you open the lid, the powder gets EVERYWHERE. You can't serve a scoop without making a mess. Other brands the powder is usually a tad thicker, but with this one, it's light and when trying to measure out a scoop, be prepared for your counter to look like Tony Montana had a party.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Uddo

customer_reviews.title: Product is awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: Product is awesome. But Amazon app wouldn't let me pick my flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Spike Trevino

customer_reviews.title: Appears to be a good product
customer_reviews.text: I add to protein powder so I am not sure of the taste by itself. Could be a little cheaper. Appears to be working.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy W.

customer_reviews.title: Needed for beginners to experts
customer_reviews.text: Great product I have used in the past and it works to get stronger much quicker and without the soreness of not using it. It also has a great flavor.

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: I just switched from another creatine brand to BSN so I’m waiting to see. But so far, blends very well and is tasteless. Considering monthly subscription.

customer_reviews.title: Good

Each morning after taking this the night before I just have to do my normal morning stretching and I have no pain anymore!

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great, works great.
customer_reviews.text: Use for post work out recovery. Great flavor and good results so far.

customer_reviews.text: Tastes great and seems to deliver a boost to workouts.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome priduct i use it with my pre work out.

customer_reviews.title: All in one supplement
customer_reviews.text: Love the all-in-one aspect. However, I think its the creatine additive, but the flavor is not the greatest. I use the watermelon aminoX product and it tastes completely different. The all in one is the perfect post workout hydration recovery though!

customer_reviews.title: My favorite
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite creatine product that i've tried. Its got creatine monohydrate as well as creatine hydrochlorate, which are the 2 most popular forms of creatine on the market today. It also has creatine anhydrous in the blend. It also includes glutamine for faster recovery which is awesome. Taste is great, my favorites are blue raz and grape.

customer_reviews.text: This is o e of those fitness products that are cheap but really work. Creatine is good for so many physical processes that you have to have it.

customer_reviews.title: Quick recovery, incredible taste, great results
customer_reviews.text: Cell mass was the first creative post workout I ever used and was one of my favorites to date. I started training and quickly put on weight and muscle mass over the first month and a half while using. I found incredibly quick recovery times even through extensive or excessive training. Absolutely love cell mass!

product_meta.title: BSN Micronized Creatine Monohydrate Powder, Unflavored, 2 Months Supply-60 Servings
product_meta.description: Color:CreatineCellmass 2.0 50 servings arctic berry taking cellmass 2.0. Mix one scoop of BSN Creatine with 8-12 fl oz. water or your favorite beverage
feature_bullets: Support lean muscle mass: Help you get the most out of your workout
Support strength & power: Aid in the ability to push heavy weight
Support performance – help take your training to the next level
5 gram of Creatine monohydrate per serving – the industry standard of recommended intake
Easily mixes in liquid – micronized to dissolve quickly

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
